data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dong, Yan, Sun, Yan-Mei, Xue, Xiao-Feng (2016): Two new eriophyid mite species associated with Clematisternifloravar. mandshurica in China (Acari, Eriophyidae). ZooKeys 621: 1-14, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.621.9443, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.621.9443
